Package org.boardgames.crossway.model

package org.boardgames.crossway.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.boardgames.crossway
     
    org.boardgames.crossway.model.rules
     
    org.boardgames.crossway.controller
     
    org.boardgames.crossway.ui
     
    org.boardgames.crossway.utils
     
  • Class
    Description
    Board
    Represents the game board with a fixed square size.
    BoardChangeListener
    Listener interface for receiving notifications when the game board changes.
    BoardSize
    An immutable record representing the size of a square board.
    Game
    Core game logic implementation for the Crossway board game.
    History
    A linear history implementation with undo and redo functionality.
    Move
    An immutable class representing a single move in the game, consisting of a point on the board and the stone placed at that point.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game with a name, stone color, and win counter.
    PlayerManager
    Manages the two players of the game, their colors and scores.
    Point
    An immutable record representing a point on the game board.
    Squares
    Utility class for operations related to 2x2 squares on the game board.
    Stone
    Enum representing the two types of stones used in the game, Black and White.
